input: Which of the following Bills requires prior assent of the President before presenting in the Parliament? P. A Bill for the formation of boundaries of a state Q. A money Bill R. A Bill which involved expenditures from the consolidated fund of India S. A Bill affecting taxation in which the interest of states is vested
explanation: There are some bills which require prior recommendation of the President: Bill that seeks to alter the boundaries of the states and names of the states, Money Bill (as per Article 110) & Finance Bill, Any bill which affects the taxation in which the states are interested (Article 274) and State Bills which impose restriction upon freedom of trade.
